const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "retrievers_example",
  settings: {
    number_of_shards: 1,
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      vector: {
        type: "dense_vector",
        dims: 3,
        similarity: "l2_norm",
        index: true,
        index_options: {
          type: "flat",
        },
      },
      text: {
        type: "text",
      },
      year: {
        type: "integer",
      },
      topic: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
